Isla Los Islotes.knownFor: “ Amazing sight in the Sea of Cortez ” Reviewed February 17, 2013 When visiting Espiritu Santo, be sure to stop by Isla Los Islotes. This small outcropping in the Sea of Cortez is home to a huge colony of Sea lions. Whether on a private yacht or a charter, plan to spend some time here.
